name: Un conte à votre façon
description:
Raymond Queneau (1903 – 1976) is one of the very first interactive fiction writers. He only wrote one, Un conte à votre façon (A Story as You Like it) in 1967.

Since so few people seemed to know this story, I made a Twine out of it. Un conte à votre façon was originally written like a Choose Your Own Adventure book. I adapted it a little to fit the Twine format.

Click here to read the story as it was originally published (in french)

Click here to play it in english (since someone already adapted it)
